name: Just eat just enough
description:
Kill, eat, and survive.

Game Made for Ludum Dare 40, theme: "The more you have, the worse it is".

Instructions:
- the more health you have, slower and bigger you are
- kill fish to score points
- fish drop food
- eat food to regain health
- shoot cost health
- if the health is low it will regenerate (just enough for one shoot)

Controls:
- WASD to move
- Mouse to Aim
- Left mouse button to shoot
